dc:title: About Many Things in N. Y. And on Farm
dc:author: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A collection of "odds and ends of things that happen around the Catholic Worker:" cleaning, weddings and births, the activities of the Mott Street office, CW's correspondence, a day at Maryknoll, the Easton farm, and her plans for some recently donated property on Staten Island. Notes "To live with children around is good for the spirit."
